metadata.name: The Red Scarf
metadata.description:
The Red Scarf 


Grey was the lake 

With frozen shards of snow


Grey was the sky 

Where the clouds seem to grow


Grey was her little boat 

Which her tender hands were rowing


Grey were her clothes 

that daily she was wearing 


Grey was all she saw 

Grey was all she felt 

Grey was her night and 

Grey was her day 


With everything grey she forgot how to laugh

The only thing that wasnâ€™t grey,

Was her little red scarf...... 





Location - Kashmir , India

Dimensions - 4660 x 3728
